scripts.install-deps: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.verify: npm run lint && npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.security-check: npm audit && cd client && npm audit && cd ../server && npm audit
scripts.security-fix: npm audit fix && cd client && npm audit fix && cd ../server && npm audit fix
scripts.security-fix-force: npm audit fix --force && cd client && npm audit fix --force && cd ../server && npm audit fix --force
scripts.update-deps: npm update && cd client && npm update && cd ../server && npm update
